task_info: backwards masking of emotions e.g., fear or happy, with neutral emotions, before participant responds with buttons
target_info: set below any input variables relating to the target/prime
choice_reps_info: choose how many times all combinations of the above appear in a run
design_info: set inputs for the overall task design e.g., runs, blocks per run
jitter_info: set below the jitter range you want between trials and how many in the range
mask_info: set below the mask timing and emotion to be used
response_info: set below the time the participant has to respond after the mask is gone and with which buttons
display_info: set other inputs relating to the screen display
mri_info: set info about mri fmri sequence, in seconds, mm
